Articles.Content: Ive heard that there may be a function to repair ships and other vessels. has it been implemented yet? is there any way to repair a ship in flight or after landing on a planet or moon?
you can fix wheels by disembarking a kerbal, getting near the wheel, then right-clicking it. Beyond that, it's on the 'to do' list.
damn. I broke off a solar panel while adding another module to my space station.
Wheels work if they are still on your craft otherwhise the kerbal will fix the wheel but not put it back, with other words: It will repair the well where it is
You CAN now replace broken solar panels, and some other small parts. Take a look at the Kerbal Attachment System thread over on the addon release sub forum
